intro: Matayba obovata, commonly known as the broad-ovate matayba, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its broad, ovate leaves and showy yellow flowers that bloom in clusters.
